title: Managed Configuration
description: The managed configuration for the NP Check-in for Rock RMS app.

checkin_address.description: The address of your check-in server.

enable_label_caching.description: If labels should be cached locally.

cache_duration.description: The number of seconds to cache a label.

printer_override.description: Overrides the ip address to print to.

printer_timeout.description: The amount of time to wait for a print job to complete.

bluetooth_printing.description: If bluetooth printing should be enabled.

enable_inapp_settings.description: If the in-app settings should be enabled.

inapp_settings_delay.description: The number of seconds for the guesture to open the in-app settings

inapp_settings_pin.description: The pin to use to lock the in-app settings

managed_overrides_local.description: If this is set, managed settings will overide local ones.
